excerpt: "The new Volvo EX90 will offer an advanced suite of eight cameras, five radar units, 16 ultrasonic sensors, and a forward-facing LiDAR (Light Detection and Ranging) machine. Altogether, the system constantly scans the vehicle's environment creating what Volvo calls an \"invisible\" 360-degree shield of safety,"
